Metropolitan detroit diaper bank open every second wednesday . fill form online https://www.detroitdiaperbank.com/diapers/  and call in advance for appointment (313-356-6470
Advised to arrive early as the line starts forming early", "email": "", "url": "https://www.detroitdiaperbank.com/diapers/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "8000 Woodward Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "North End", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48202", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3746379, "longitude": -83.0755337}, "phones": [{"number": "(888) 294-6554", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
